meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dopey.
meanings.sent1: Her dopinesses was evident as she struggled to keep her eyes open during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent2: The dopinesses of the sloth made it move very slowly through the trees.
meanings.sent3: Despite his dopinesses, he managed to solve the puzzle with a goofy grin.
meanings.sent4: The dopinesses of the old computer system was like trying to run a marathon in quicksand.
meanings.sent5: The dopinesses of the puppy after a long nap was adorable to watch.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being sluggish or slow in movement or thought.
meanings.sent1: The dopinesses of the turtle was evident as it slowly made its way across the road.
meanings.sent2: His dopinesses in the morning made him take longer to get ready for school.
meanings.sent3: The dopinesses of the snail racing competition made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The dopinesses of the traffic jam felt like time was standing still.
meanings.sent5: The dopinesses of the sloth hanging from the tree was a sight to behold.
